title: WTB: T206 Sherry Magee w/ Bat

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Sherry Magee w/ Bat
posts.post_content:
Hello,

Looking for a T206 Magee w/Bat in an SGC 10 or SGC20. If anyone can help please send me a PM or email me at [url]rheffner79@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks,
Ryan H.

If you decide you can step up to an SGC 40, this one is available for $99 (price includes insurance and delivery confirmation).   PayPal OK.

If it's not for you, here's a bump anyway...
